T02TD3781E:222a-0: @222a * // dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhugs so /
T02TD3781E:222a-4: // / # // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3781E:222a-5: bkra shis gang zhig rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku //
T02TD3781E:222a-6: gcig nyid dang ni du ma nyid kyang rnam spangs pa'i //
T02TD3781E:222a-7: ma gos gzugs med rdul dang bral ba gang yin pa'i //
T02TD3781E:222a-8: bkra shis de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs shog //
T02TD3781E:222b-0: bkra @222b shis gang zhig sangs rgyas sras kyis yongs bskor zhing //
T02TD3781E:222b-1: longs spyod rdzogs sku dam chos kyi ni gsung dang bcas //
T02TD3781E:222b-2: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yongs su brgyan gyur pa //
T02TD3781E:222b-3: bkra shis de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs shog / bkra shis gang zhig nags kyi me ni mched pa ltar //
T02TD3781E:222b-4: 'jug dang 'bar dang yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yis //
T02TD3781E:222b-5: sprul pa'i sku mchog gzhan gyi don ni mdzad pa po //
T02TD3781E:222b-6: bkra shis de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs shog //
T02TD3781E:222b-7: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun la phan byed pa'i //
T02TD3781E:222b-8: sangs rgyas rnam dag blo ldan nyis pa'i tshogs dang bral //
T02TD3781E:222b-9: shes rab yan lag 'dus pas mdzes pa bde ba'i bdag / bkra shis de yis khyed rnams la ni dbang mchog bskur ba'o //
T02TD3781E:222b-10: bkra shis gang zhig lha dang lha min mis mchod pa //
T02TD3781E:222b-11: de yi bstan pa'i dam chos bla na med pa ni //
T02TD3781E:222b-12: bdag med 'jig rten gsum la rab tu grags pa yi //
T02TD3781E:222b-13: bkra shis de yis khyed rnams la ni dbang mchog bskur //
T02TD3781E:222b-14: bkra shis gang zhig rab mchog dam chos rtag tu 'dzin //
T02TD3781E:222b-15: bzang po'i sar zhugs sangs rgyas sras po tshogs kyi mchog / rnam pa kun du sems can don mdzad bkra shis bzang //
T02TD3781E:222b-16: bkra shis de yis khyed rnams la ni dbang mchog bskur ;
T02TD3781E:222b-17: / zhes bya ba ni slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa sangs rgyas sku gsum chos dang dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa'o//
